snippet: The journalists from Al Jazeera English face charges that include belonging to a terrorist group and harming Egypt’s reputation abroad.
abstract: Egyptian prosecutors order three detained journalists from the news channel Al Jazeera English to be held in custody for 15 more days, on charges that include belonging to a terrorist group and harming the country's reputation abroad.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and ASMAA AL ZOHAIRY

lead_paragraph: The journalists from Al Jazeera English face charges that include belonging to a terrorist group and harming Egypt’s reputation abroad.

headline.main: Egypt Says 3 Journalists Will Be Held 15 More Days
headline.print_headline: Egypt Says 3 Journalists Will Be Detained 15 More Days
